page.title: 13CLUBS IN FRECKLETON
page.content: The following amenities are available for those people who live at the Freckleton end of our area; day classes in sequence dancing and dress making. Evening classes in keep fit, judo and childrens' dancing. Clubs include; tennis, cricket, football, badminton, bowls, air cadets, venture group (16-21 years), venture group (girls), scouts, cubs, guides, brownies, senior citizens, youth. Other activities include; whist drives, playgroups, silver band, Womens' Institiute. The local churches run the young wives, mothers' union and Sunday school groups.
